name: Copilot Commitmentphobe
pickupLine: Heard you like dependable partners—too bad my suggestions ghost harder than Copilot during merge conflicts.
prompt: quirky bug with pixelated hair and hoodie takes a selfie with laptop in a cozy café, code flying above their coffee mug, dreamy Studio Ghibli, bright pastels, cinematic lighting

name: Quantum Queue Cutie
pickupLine: If we ever meet IRL, odds are higher than quantum laptop shipping before 2030—so, basically zero. Wanna collapse our waveforms?
prompt: glitchy bug floating with futuristic hiking gear, neon backpack, quantum circuits spiral in the misty valley backdrop, dreamy Studio Ghibli, bright pastels, cinematic lighting

name: Rusty Heartbreaker
pickupLine: I’ll ‘borrow’ your time and never give it back—strict ownership rules, but my problems? Totally your crash.
prompt: animated bug in flannel, posing on a mountaintop with a hiking staff made of rusted metal, forest vista below, dreamy Studio Ghibli, bright pastels, cinematic lighting

name: K8s Kloset Skeleton
pickupLine: Like your cloud bill, I’ll haunt your wallet and mysteries long after you thought you deleted me. Ready for a FinOps confession?
prompt: bug with a cluster-shaped backpack, sipping overpriced coffee on a rooftop next to cloud-shaped pillows, dreamy Studio Ghibli, bright pastels, cinematic lighting

name: VisionPro Mirage
pickupLine: I’m like your Vision Pro budget—expensive and gone before you know it… but at least I won’t fog up your glasses.
prompt: sleek bug in shiny AR headset, taking a gym mirror selfie surrounded by floating UI elements and virtual pets, dreamy Studio Ghibli, bright pastels, cinematic lighting
